simplified: 中国人民武装警察部队
word: 中國人民武裝警察部隊

definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: Article 63. This Law shall apply to the Chinese Peoples Armed Police Force.
sentences.chinese: 第六十三條本法適用於中國人民武裝警察部隊。

sentences.english: The Armed Police service is one of the central tasks of CAPF.
sentences.chinese: 武警勤務是中國人民武裝警察部隊中心工作之一。
